askBuy: Do you want to buy {space.render} for M{space.price}?
pressForRollDices: Press any key to roll dices...
buyRent: You arrived on {space.render}, you have to pay M{rent} of rent to {space.owner}
buyTax: You arrived on {space.render}, you have to pay M{space.amount} of tax
salary: Congratulation! You receive M200 of salary
playAgain: You got a double, you must play again
playerHasToDrawChanceCard: You arrived on Chance space, you have to draw a Chance card

playerGoJailDouble: You made 3 doubles in a row, go to jail!
maxJailTurn: You tried 3 times to get a double to get out of jail, you have to pay M50 to get out
goJail: You arrived on the 'Go to jail' space, go to jail
